name: 2D platformer - Final (Kunsan Jeon)
description:
As I mentioned previously, I added two different levels and also extend the map to give different experience to player

Level 2 is twice larger than level1  and Level 3 is 5 times bigger than level 2.

Each level has different enemies and each enemy has other attack types.

Level 3 enemies have more intelligent AI which will give players much challenge. 

change the game title, "Escape Ulton" to give a short story of the play.

Added the instruction to teach players how to play

Finally, added the winning page, if the player wins the final level, they receive a winning message. 

PS.

I tried a new theme with new assets but failed....Somehow the error appears in the code and was unable to fix it.
